item.description:
So, Bob's Southern Bistro is closing their doors ... Forever! They've been in business for 50 years!

According to their website, the live jazz is from 7:30pm to 11:30pm. So, if any of you are planning to go to the Cantab at 9pm / 9:30pm (Check calendar for other listing on same night), then maybe you could stop in at Bob's Southern Bistro first.

You'll need to call my cell phone at 617-999-9094 to find me.

Check out Bob's Southern Bistro for directions and other info:

http://www.bobssouthe...

Cheers!

Lisa
item.name: Live Jazz at Bob's Southern Bistro
